description: Track your social experiences with compassion

interactions.label: Initiated Conversation
interactions.description: You started a conversation with someone

interactions.label: Responded Positively
interactions.description: You responded warmly to someone's interaction

interactions.label: Met a New Person
interactions.description: You introduced yourself to someone new

interactions.label: Did a Favor
interactions.description: You helped someone or did something kind

interactions.label: Listened Intently
interactions.description: You gave someone your full attention

comfortLevels.label: Very Comfortable
comfortLevels.description: Felt completely at ease and confident

comfortLevels.label: Comfortable
comfortLevels.description: Felt good and relaxed during the interaction

comfortLevels.label: Slightly Uncomfortable
comfortLevels.description: Felt some mild discomfort or nervousness
